abilities.description: Your diving bell carries passengers into the depths within an air-filled chamber. It offers a refuge when diving the seabed or while exploring underwater wrecks, ruins, or caves. When you set off from the bell on a perilous undersea dive, or return to the bell after a dive, take +1 momentum.

Your diving bell is fitted with a rigid hull. When you @Compendium[foundry-ironsworn.starforgedmoves.e6ed148eff82c171]{Face Danger} to test its strength against the crushing depths, roll +integrity and add +1. When you must @Compendium[foundry-ironsworn.starforgedmoves.3782f1b3c8ca8b88]{Withstand Damage} against pressure or impact, take +1 momentum or +1 integrity on a strong hit.
When you use the diving bell to @Compendium[foundry-ironsworn.starforgedmoves.367804b98f30d5f4]{Explore a Waypoint}, add +1.
